abstract: Facebook has revamped its profile pages to its new Timeline layout, and it will become the standard for every user within the next few weeks.
snippet: Facebook has revamped its profile pages to its new Timeline layout, and it will become the standard for every user within the next few weeks.
lead_paragraph: Just when you thought you had finally figured out Facebook once and for all, here comes a whole new way to spend all your time tinkering with it. Over the next few weeks, every one of Facebook’s nearly one billion members will have their profile pages forcibly updated to an ambitious new layout that Facebook calls Timeline.

headline.main: Ready or Not, Time to Share More
headline.print_headline: Ready or Not, Time to Share More
